title: One wedding and several migrations
creator_credit: Adriana Gomberg, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: The dream of happiness is timeless and universal. Adriana Gomberg looks fondly back at her wedding day and recalls the reasons why her and her husband left Brazil to migrate to Australia. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
